thread.title: Karan Took THIS person To Visit His Baby Twins
thread.title_full: Karan Took THIS person To Visit His Baby Twins

title: Karan Took THIS person To Visit His Baby Twins
text: facebook 207 SHARES Whether it be his feud with Kangana Ranaut or the news of him becoming a father, Karan Johar has been the news for sometime now. And it looks like he is not going anywhere soon. It seems that Karan's twins are still in the hospital because of premature delivery. The two are swiftly recovering and Karan, the good daddy he is, visits them quite often. But the last time he made a visit, he took along with him, close friend and filmmaker, Ayan Mukherjee. This makes Ayan the first to witness the two cuties. How lucky is he? We hope the babies recover soon and their adorable faces make it to our news feeds.
